typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		BUSINESS_UNIT as string,
		ASSET_ID as string,
		EFFDT as string,
		OWNING_BUS_UNIT7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(BUSINESS_UNIT = lpad(BUSINESS_UNIT,5,'0'),
		EFFDT = coalesce(toDate(EFFDT,'MM-dd-yyyy'),'1899-12-31')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
